00016 
00017 /*  ========================================================================
00018     This type conveys the Error Codes, [GSM 04.80, 4.5]
00019     Values taken from msap_msg_mn.pr line 1481 ff
00020     ========================================================================*/
00022 class SsErrorCode {
00023     public:
00025         enum Code {
00027             MsIntSsError                        = 0,
00029             MsIntSsTimeOut                      = 255,
00031             UnknownSubscriber                   = 1,
00033             IllegalSubscriber                   = 9,
00035             BearerServiceNotProvisioned         = 10,
00037             TeleserviceNotProvisioned           = 11,
00039             IllegalEquipment                    = 12,
00041             CallBarred                          = 13,
00043             IllegalSsOperation                  = 16,
00045             SsErrorStatus                       = 17,
00047             SsNotAvailable                      = 18,
00049             SsSubscriptionViolation             = 19,
00051             SsIncompatibility                   = 20,
00053             FacilityNotSupported                = 21,
00055             AbsentSubscriber                    = 27,
00057             SystemFailure                       = 34,
00059             DataMissing                         = 35,
00061             UnexpectedDataValue                 = 36,
00063             PwRegistrationFailure               = 37,
00065             NegativePwCheck                     = 38,
00067             NumberOfPwAttemptsViolation         = 43,
00069             PositionMethodError                 = 54,
00071             UnknownAlphabet                     = 71,
00073             UssdBusy                            = 72,
00075             MaxNumberOfMptyParticipantsExceeded = 126,
00077             ResourcesNotAvailable               = 127,
00079             TaggedError                         = 128,
00081             NoError
00082         };
00083 
00085         SsErrorCode(UINT8 incoming_byte = 0) : m_code(incoming_byte) {}
00086 
00088         UINT8 GetByte() const { return m_code; }
00089 
00091         Code GetCode() const { return (Code)m_code; }
00093         void SetCode(Code code) { m_code = (UINT8)m_code; }
00094 
00095     private:
00096         UINT8 m_code;
00097 };
